Title: Provides for revocation of drivers' licenses and registrations for multiple driving while intoxicated convictions
Summary: Relates to revocation of drivers' licenses and registrations for multiple driving while intoxicated convictions; provides an automatic 10 year license revocation for 3rd offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to revocation of drivers' licenses and registrations for driving while intoxicated convictions
